author: GameSpot
description:
With Clair Obscur Expedition 33 winning our Game of the Year in 2025, we wanted to take a look back at the past to celebrate all our Game of the Year Awards. See timestamps below!

Timestamps: 
0:00 Intro
0:32 Diablo (1996)
0:51 Total Annihilation (1997)
1:04 The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time (1998)
1:15 Grim Fandango (1998)
1:30 Soul Calibur (1999)
1:44 Everquest (1999)
1:56 Chrono Cross (2000)
2:17 The Sims (2000)
2:37 Grand Theft Auto 3 (2001)
2:57 Serious Sam: First Encounter (2001)
3:17 Metroid Prime (2002)
3:37 The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker (2003)
3:53 World of Warcraft (2004)
4:09 Resident Evil 4 (2005)
4:30 Gears of War (2006)
4:52 Super Mario Galaxy (2007)
5:09 Metal Gear Solid: Guns of the Patriot (2008)
5:34 Demon's Souls (2009)
5:58 Red Dead Redemption (2010)
6:28 The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim (2011)
6:45 Journey (2012)
7:05 The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds (2013)
7:30 Middle Earth: Shadow of Mordor (2014)
7:46 The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt (2015)
8:07 Overwatc
title: Every GameSpot Game of The Year (Up To 2025)
